subtask.title: Analyze Features and Characteristics of Each LLM Agent Type
subtask.objective: Detail the defining features, capabilities, and typical architectures of each identified LLM agent type.
subtask.scope: Deep dive into technical attributes, strengths, limitations, and typical deployment scenarios.

verification.completion_summary: The collected findings comprehensively address the analysis of features, characteristics, architectures, strengths, limitations, and deployment considerations of various LLM agent types, aligning well with the original objectives.

covered_aspects: Definitions and features of different agent types (deterministic, generative, hybrid)
Technical architectures including tools, orchestration, environment grounding
Deployment scenarios and practical implementation guidance
missing_aspects: Explicit detailed comparison of each agent typeâ€™s architecture and capabilities in a structured manner
Specific typical architectures for each agent type
More concrete examples or case studies illustrating each type

missing_requirements: Distinct, detailed profiles of each LLM agent type's architecture and features
Clearer delineation of capabilities, strengths, and limitations per type
Structured comparison or framework summarizing differences
